name: David Chang
text: Decent pizza. Good value.

name: Si Mone
text: We order from here often. The wait time is never very long unless it is a game day. We've only had an issue w/a rude cashier once. Overall, this is a really good location.

name: David Cal
text: Great owner,,He looks out for everyone. This pizza hut,,Has a really great crew. Delivery time, and Great toppings. Fresh,and hot everytime. Keep up the great work.

name: Myra Gartman
text: The pizza was delicious. It was a thin crust super supreme with extra cheese and it was perfect.  We also got cheesy bread and the brownie for desert.  Because my sister was on a cain, the manager brought our order to the car for her.  We love Pizza Hut.

name: patrick horton
text: It’s fattening but required for a perfect balance between life and death!

text: Fast.. clean and friendly staff..

text: My food was hot and tasty! It took about 12 minutes overall.

name: Rebecca Mitchell
text: Your delivery drivers need to learn how to freakin drive. I had one driver run over our wood poles in the ground and another who’s name is Garret run over my neighbors rose bushes!!!

text: Have ordered from them all the time the past 5 times I have got none of the sauces I have paid extra for or the sauces included with the food. Food constantly comes cold. Will not be giving this pizza hit anymore of my money.

text: I placed an order online and as I was following my tracker it should have been delivered. I called the store and was told that my order left out at 5:13pm, it was 5:45 when I called. The driver just called and said that the way he was …More
